product.name: Amber & Cedar Soy Candle
product.description: Hand-poured soy candle crafted in small batches in Vermont. Features a complex fragrance of warm amber, smoky cedarwood, and hints of vanilla bean. Each candle is made with 100% natural soy wax and cotton wicks for a clean, even burn.
benefits: Clean burn with no black soot
Beautiful vessel for reuse after burning

store_brand.brand_voice: Warm, welcoming, and curated. We help you create a home that feels like a sanctuary. Every product is chosen with care, quality, and your comfort in mind.
store_brand.visual_style: Warm neutrals with terracotta and sage accents. Soft natural lighting. Cozy textures like linen, wood, and ceramic. Clean but warm typography.

product_brand.brand_voice: Artisanal, authentic, rooted in nature. We handcraft small-batch goods using time-honored techniques and sustainably sourced materials. Every piece tells a story.
product_brand.visual_style: Rustic and handmade aesthetic. Wood grain textures, linen backgrounds. Soft, natural photography. Hand-drawn typography elements.

channel.audience_context: Homeowners aged 30-55 interested in home decor, cozy living, and sustainable products. Value quality craftsmanship and supporting small makers.

store_context.customer_summary: Home decor enthusiasts who appreciate curated, quality goods. They prefer unique, artisanal products over mass-produced items and value sustainability.
